If you are a non-prime member of the game you will only get hackers against you and then get banned even if you yourself weren't using hacks if one of your teammates used hacks. Shitty game for beginners or new accounts.

good game! 
I advise you to switch to faceit or esea, if you really know how to play well and own a weapon at a high level!
Люблю ходить в лес по грибы.
shot a guy 8 times for 78 with the ak chest up great game
this game is a realistic shooter that has unique and awesome situations highly recommended
its wayyyy more in depth than i originally thought. i had no idea. now im hooked. Big in-game gun economy where you can trade and bid on expensive gun skins.
esta lleno de chiteros juego del orto

Best FPS game out there. No crazy features or abilities. Simple old fashioned FPS.

For beginners who want to play CSGO i advice u to buy prime (basically less hackers). It only cost 15 euro and 100% worth it. You can also get prime for free by playing and leveling up till lvl 21, but that takes time and during that time u will face some hackers.
very bad game would not reccomend
Very fun game but a lot of hackers
well around 2 yrs ago my 12 year old self decided to hack and i wish i wasnt vac'ed :( great game tho
mecanica de formação de equipes é deplorável!!!! um lixo total!!!
Very good game. Could use some work
Ideal para los que laburamos y tenemos un tiempito para 1 o 2 partidas (equivale a 1 hora, 2 maximo..)

Juegaso epico bestial para leones gorilas osos y bestias mas potentes. Estrategia pura, AIM y ser un terrorista enfermo o un poli capacitado. Vale cada centavo ahre es gratis. PD: tiene mas chiteros que todos los juegos del mundo juntos una cagada
Great game if you are all about competitiveness. You can face some cheaters tho...
